bibl.title: Arlington and Johnson v. . Order of Writ of Habeas Corpus
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: In the District court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory holding Terms at Tacoma on and further County.
The Territory of Washington v. Timothy Johnson } order

On reading and filing in of Timothy Johnson duly seined and herefore by him whereby it appears that he is unlawfully imprisoned and reshamed of his liberty by Lewis Byrd of Pierce County Washington Territory at the jail in the City of Tacoma on and County in Washington Territory and Habeas Corpus the tlyably consists to from which it appears to me a writ of Habeas Corpus ought to rise

It is under what a writ of Habeas Corpus issued out of and render the seal of the District Court of the Judicial District of Washington Territory directed be on saw Lewis Byrd Sheriff of said Pierce County commanding him to have the body of the said Timothy Johnson hereto and Court Home in the City of
Tacoma an Monday the 28th day of January AD 1885 at one oclock p, n of that day to do and receive what shall then and there be considered concerning one said Timothy Johnson together with the time and cause of his destruction and that be have then and there The said writ.

D.C. 2d Judl. Dist.
Territory v. Johnson
Order for writ of Habeas corpus
